RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Clai m Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGGIE bumped hard with a rival at the start, was coaxed along on the inside, drafted along the rail on the turn, was asked with a clear rail opening at the quarter-pole, came through to make a bid inside of the pacesetter in upper stretch, took the advantage under a drive outside the sixteenth-pole then drew clear under steady urging. BABY SOX broke out at the start, raced just off the pace between foes, was asked in the four path while outside on the turn, gained to make a bid outside the quarter-pole, took a short lead in upper stretch, drifted out under a left-handed crop coming to the furlong marker, switched to a right-handed crop while losing the advantage outside the sixteenth-pole and was outfinished while able to secure the place. SERENADE SOLDIER was hustled to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied in close to the two path on the turn, was asked near the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage under a drive in upper stretch, fought into the final furlong and weakened while well clear for the show. PHINNEYS HARBOR broke in and bumped hard with a rival, tracked the pace down the backstretch, was asked in the three path on the turn, chased into the stretch and tired. GOODBYE KYLE veered out at the start then was corrected by the rider, chased the pace on the outside under heavy left-rein pressure, dropped back quickly while lugging out badly late on the backstretch, went seven wide under a vigorous left-handed grip early on the turn, was guided back to the five path then moved to the four path nearing the quarter-pole and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Serenade Soldier
ENTRY.OWNER: McGuire Matthew T Hoover Michael L Rulapaugh Jr Terry Wayne and McGuire James Wa
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to front,pace,2path turn,headed 3/16,weakened,clear 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Maggie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard brk,coaxed,ins turn,ask1/4,rail bid,lead ins1/8,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Phinneys Harbor
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,bmpd hard,tracked,asked 3path turn,chased,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Sox
ENTRY.OWNER: Tanzman David Speranza Steven Hablan Los Caballos LLC and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,btwn,ask 4p turn,bid1/4,led3/16-1/8,drift out,outfinshd

ENTRY.NAME: Goodbye Kyle
ENTRY.OWNER: Jacobson David David A Bernsen LLC and Lambert Jeffrey
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer out brk,chsd out,lug out,drop bck fast1/2,lug out 7-4w,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUCHO MAMA MIA chased two to three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, took to the inside near the three-sixteenths when UNHOLY backed away, rallied inside to take command inside the eighth pole, then edged clear to the finish to prevail. SHOTGUN PATSY coaxed from the gate, dueled three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, dug in and was collared just inside the eighth pole, ran on to preserve the place honors. MONTAUK MYSTIQUE stumbled at the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five then four wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. CAUSE I'M ELEGANT chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four then three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. STRANGE FRUIT broke out a step at the start and was bumped by MAXING THE BANK, who was recovering from a stumble, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact, then was reported to have bled. UNHOLY coaxed from the gate, dueled along the inside of SHOTGUM PATSY, came under coaxing near the three-eighths and was headed for command at that station, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened. MAXING THE BANK stumbled badly at the start bumping STRANGE FRUIT when taking a left turn sharply when recovering and lost the rider in the process, then got apprehended by outrider and walked off under her own power.

ENTRY.NAME: Unholy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Lion Thoroughbreds and Skelly Matthew S
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st. dueled 2p, inside turn, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Strange Fruit
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out step, bumped st, chased 2-3w, 6-7w upper, no impact, bled

ENTRY.NAME: Maxing the Bank
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled badly st, lost rider, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Mama Mia
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, to ins 3/16, up, edged cl

ENTRY.NAME: Shotgun Patsy
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 3-2w, up 3/8, 3-2w upper, collared, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Mystique
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 5-4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Cause I'm Elegant
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4-3w upper, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 90. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allow ed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAY ZONE broke out and bumped with a foe then was corrected by the rider, sped clear then opened up a sizable advantage under his own power, went around the turn in the two path, was asked after turning into the stretch, came under a right-handed crop while starting to drift out at the eighth-pole, continued to drift out some while tiring in the final furlong and held under steady urging. TENEBRIS was bumped on both sides at the start, settled under some urging, saved ground on the turn, came off the rail while in pursuit of the winner in the stretch, gained in the final furlong and finished willingly for the place. CLUBHOUSE bumped hard with rivals on both sides at the start, was urged along off the pace, went around the turn in the three path, gained on the winner in the final furlong and earned the show. BUILT TO LAST bumped hard with rivals on both sides at the start, settled off the pace, dropped back nearing the half-mile pole then angled out despite room in front, went five wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. BARON'S LEGACY bumped hard with rivals on both sides at the start then was taken up, spotted the front a few lengths, was urged along at the rear, went around the turn in the two path and failed to threaten. TIVY veered in at the start and bumped hard with a foe which caused a chain bumping reaction of several rivals, settled on the outside, was urged along in the four path on the turn and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Pay Zone
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,sped clear,opened up,2p turn,drft out last1/8,held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Country Life Farm and Keep Right LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Tenebris
ENTRY.OWNER: Tessore Bruno Proud Stable Inc and Preve Dominguez Camilo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd both sides brk,settled some urging,ins turn,chsd,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Baron's Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard btwn brk,tkn up,at rear,2path turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Built to Last
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard btwn brk,settled,angled out 1/2,5w turn,6w1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Clubhouse
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard btwn brk,urged along,3path turn,gained,earned show

ENTRY.NAME: Tivy
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in brk,bmpd hard,settled outside,4path turn,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTI ONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferr ed)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OCALA DREAM just off the inside tracking from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, angled five wide into upper stretch, closed well to issue a challenge through the final furlong taking command near the sixteenth marker, then edged clear to the finish to prevail. AGENT CREED settled unhurried just off the inside near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. LET'S GO BIG BLUE coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside from just off the pace, came under coaxing along the inside at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, leaned on at the three-sixteenths nudging KING OF COMEDY and ran on to secure the show honors. KING OF COMEDY broke in at the start bumping STRAIGHT ARROW, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, got nudged by the aforementioned foe with three-sixteenths to go, improved position staying on to the finish. STRAIGHT ARROW broke out a step at the start and was bumped by KING OF COMEDY breaking inwards and was away last conceding three lengths to the front before settling into stride, saved ground near the rear of the field, came under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, cut the corner into upper stretch and was paused in behind RINALDI and then ROUGH DRAFT after tipping to the two path just inside the three-sixteenths, awaited a pair of rivals to clear outside after tipping to the three path a furlong out, tipped out to the four then five path near the sixteenth marker in the clear for the first time in the stretch and was tepidly urged by the rider through to the finish. KLICKITAT tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish but was outkicked. ROUGH DRAFT three then two wide in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive taking narrow and brief command a furlong from home, got collared nearing the sixteenth pole and weakened to the finish. CITIZEN K coaxed from the start, tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch and offered no response. RINALDI coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat from a host of rivals and was collared a furlong from home, then weakened through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Klickitat
ENTRY.OWNER: JohLis Racing LLC and Daly Double Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 5/16, angled 5-6w upper, one paced, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Agent Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p near rear, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Rinaldi
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, yielded 1/8, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Big Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 3w uppr, dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Straight Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, bumped st, svd grd, cut corner, beh foes to 1/16, tepid

ENTRY.NAME: King of Comedy
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David Maxis Stable and Gardella Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 4w uppr, dug in, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Citizen K
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, tracked ins, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Ocala Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Bouchey Steven and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, up 1/16, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Rough Draft
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Big Toe Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w in aim, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, up 1/8p, collared, wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1 1/16M Turf CR: 70. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME CZECH was hustled from the gate then taken in hand early, saved ground while rated off the pace, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to get the lead inside the furlong marker and proved best under good handling. BOXED WINE settled on the inside, was roused on the far turn, turned into the stretch in the two path, chased under a drive into the final furlong, made a bid outside the sixteenth-pole and finished with good courage for the place. RUN FOR YOUR HONEY went around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, went two then three wide on the far turn, was roused while moving a bit further out outside the quarter-pole, came seven wide into upper stretch, remained on her inside lead while chasing to the eighth-pole then swapped to the proper lead and finished willingly for the show. ALITTLEBITNAUGHTY moved in before the first turn, went three wide on that bend, settled towards the rear on the outside, went two then three wide on the far turn, was roused near the quarter-pole then swung eight wide into upper stretch and improved position to garner the last spot in the superfecta. BOSSY JEANS went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was given her cue in the three path on the far turn, gained the lead in upper stretch, led under a drive into the final furlong then was collared by the winner and weakened. ONCE AN EAGLE went around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, was asked while two then three wide on the far turn, came five wide into upper stretch and lacked the needed response. SHE IS ALL BUSINES was off a step slow, moved in at the rear, saved ground on the first turn, settled at the back, went two then three wide on the far turn, swung seven wide into upper stretch then moved further out and failed to impact. FREE FOR ME went around the first turn in the two path, settled towards the rear, was asked outside the quarter-pole, came five wide into upper stretch, moved in near the three-sixteenths and failed to threaten. BERTRILLE angled in towards the rear, settled on the inside, was asked on the far turn and failed to rally. DENVER'S ALLEY went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked near the quarter-pole, lost the lead under a drive in upper stretch and gave way. CONEY tracked the pace on the outside in the two path, engaged the leader on the far turn, battled under a drive in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened then was vanned off after the race. BORNFORGREATNESS was taken in hand early, rounded the first turn in the three path, was reserved on the outside without cover, came under urging while three then four wide on the far turn, was driven six wide into upper stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Denver's Alley
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable Big Toe Stables LLC and Koshanostra Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,inside pace,ask1/4,headed3/16,gave way

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,ask2nd turn,2p1/4,chased,bid1/16,good courage

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,in hand,rated inside,swung 4w1/4,rallied,lead ins1/8,best

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside 2path,bid 2nd turn,drop back 1/8,wknd,vanned off

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,2-3p2nd,swung 7w into upper stretch,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Bossy Jeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w1st,settled outside,ask3w2nd,led3/16-1/8,overtaken,wknd

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,settled,ask2-3p2nd,5w into lane,lacked needed response

ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slw,mvd in,ins1st,at rear,2-3p2nd,7w3/16,mvd out,no kick

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p1st,towards rear,2p2nd,ask1/4,5w3/16,mvd in,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bornforgreatness
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,3w1st,reserved out,ask3-4w2nd,6w3/16,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Bertrille
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,settled inside,ask 2nd turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Alittlebitnaughty
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Thorne Jonathan Callahan Peter J and NLG Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,3p1st,settled out,2-3w2nd,8w into upper,improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THOUGHT EXPERIMENT four to five paths off the inside in pursuit down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying into contention a furlong out, dueled through to the finish with RISK FREE to her outside, had that foe come inwards and was brushed and nudged just inside the sixteenth marker, then got the bob on the wire to prevail in game fashion. RISK FREE chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong from home, dug in under a drive dueling to the finish, came in slightly just inside the sixteenth marker brushing and nudging the aforementioned foe, fought on gamely but ultimately lost the nod on the wire. PARTY AT GRANTS got bumped at the start by TAKE TIME TO DREAM and in turn bumped ONLOOKER and was briefly taken in hand conceding four lengths to the front, chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors in the final jumps. TAKE TIME TO DREAM broke out at the start bumping PARTY AT GRANTS into ONLOOKER, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and ran on to the finish. LA GIRVINA bobbled at the break, chased three then two wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths and went three wide into upper stretch, had the top pair go on by just inside the eighth pole and was tepidly handled and not being extended before being steadied just inside the sixteenth marker as THOUGHT EXPERIMENT was nudged in front by RISK FREE despite the option of being able to alter inside with two open paths, got out-finished in the late stages by a pair of rivals while effectively eased up. ONLOOKER got bumped at the start by PARTY AT GRANTS due to pressure from TAKE TIME TO DREAM and conceded three lengths to the front, chased three to four wide bounding along green early on, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. PUT THE CRAZY AWAY bobbled at the break, led early on briefly before chasing four then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung two to three wide into upper stretch and weakened. FEATHERING stumbled at the start, showed the way in hand along the inside, widened away into the turn and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, yielded the front and tired through to the finish. There was a Claim of foul by the rider of LA GIRVINA alleging interference against both RISK FREE and THOUGHT EXPERIMENT in the stretch. After review the claim of foul was dismissed and the result was allowed to stand before the race was declared official.

ENTRY.NAME: Feathering
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, in hand ins, widened, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Take Time to Dream
ENTRY.OWNER: MeB Racing Stables LLC Falcone Jr Robert N and League of Their Own Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, inside 1/4, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Party At Grants
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Onlooker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, strode green 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w uppr, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Risk Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, up 1/8, dueled, lost the nod

ENTRY.NAME: La Girvina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, chased 3-2w, 3w upper, steady ins 1/16, tepid

ENTRY.NAME: Put the Crazy Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, led briefly, chased 4-2w, 2-3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Thought Experiment
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w backstretch, 3w turn, 4w upper, dug in, dueled late, got bob

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 109. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRIC E OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NY TRAFFIC pressed the pace down the backstretch, dropped back near the half-mile pole, chased three then four wide on the turn, gained to make a bid outside the leading duo into upper stretch, took the lead just inside the furlong marker and edged clear under strong urging. KINETIC SKY was hustled from the gate then coaxed along off the pace, came under stronger encouragement while four then five wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, raced between foes in the final furlong and finished willingly for the place. SHERIFF BIANCO broke open his stall door prior to the start but remained in the gate, settled off the pace, was shuffled back behind the winner when that foe dropped back leaving the backstretch, was roused while moving from three to six wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and also finished willingly but just missed the place while narrowly able to get the show. ROTKNEE bobbled at the start, was taken up between foes coming to the three-quarter pole then altered to the outside, advanced on the far outside to take the lead outside the half-mile pole, vied in the three path on the turn, battled under a drive into the final furlong, dropped back into the final sixteenth and weakened then just missed the trifecta. HE'SMYHONEYBADGER was hustled to the front then showed the way, lost the lead outside the half-mile pole, vied along the rail while inside of two foes early on the turn, dropped back while steadying some coming to the three-eighths pole, kept on while moving out some in the stretch and missed the superfecta. PROVOCATEUR pressed the pace, drew even for the lead at the nine-sixteenths, vied between horses in the two path early on the turn then inside of a rival later on that bend, fought under a drive into the final furlong, dropped back into the final sixteenth and tired. WILLY BOI was last to commence, established a good position just off the pace, dropped back while moving from the rail to the three path on the turn and lacked the needed response. SYNTHESIS dropped well behind, moved from the rail to the three path on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Synthesis
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind, ins-3path turn, 4p into lane, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Willy Boi
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,well placed,ins-3path turn,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: dh-He'smyhoneybadger
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pace.headed outside 1/2,ins,stdy3/8,2p,kept on stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sheriff Bianco
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke through gate,settled,shuffled back7/16,3-6w turn,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Ny Traffic
ENTRY.OWNER: Fanelli John Cash is King LLC LC Racing LLC Braverman Paul and Team Hanley
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed,drop back1/2,chsd 3-4p turn,bid3/16,lead ins1/8,clear

ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan Tanzman David and Speranza Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,coaxed,roused 4-5p turn,btwn final1/8,willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Rotknee
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled brk,tkn up early,mvd out,gain outside,lead1/2,3p trn,wknd

ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace,vied 2path turn,battled past1/8,drop back1/16,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Winter Memories S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 97. Stakes Purse 135000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SACRED WISH tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, rallied in tandem with SILVER SKILLET and overthrew the leader a sixteenth out, then inched away from that rival in the late stages with good energy. SILVER SKILLET tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three wide into upper stretch, rallied in concert with the aforementioned foe, ran on willingly to secure the place honors. SOVIET EXCESS three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to secure the show honors. LIGURIA chased along the inside from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up late foot. LADY BETH established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside patiently handled until roused cutting the corner into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was collared a sixteenth from home, weakened in the very late stages. TAX IMPLICATIONS (GB) got bumped at the start by JUNIPERMARSHMALLOW, tracked just off the inside from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch and offered no response. JUNIPERMARSHMALLOW broke in at the start bumping the aforementioned foe, chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no rally. SWEETLOU'SGOTACES three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and weakened. BOLIVIE (IRE) settled unhurried just off the inside at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung two to three wide at the head of the stretch and made no impact. GET YOUR KICKS forwardly placed just off the inside, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, cornered three wide at the top of the stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Liguria
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, late foot

ENTRY.NAME: Bolivie (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: As One Racing Haras d'Etreham Silver Fox Racing Alternative Investment Strategie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p at rear, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Wish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Outer turf CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEING BETTY became very fractious in the gate, was hustled to the front, showed the way under pressure to her outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the lead at the five-sixteenths, dueled inside of the runner-up in the stretch, regained the ascendancy in the final sixteenth and gamely prevailed. STORMY DISCO broke out at the start, was forwardly placed on the outside, made a bid leaving the backstretch, vied in the three path on the turn, took a short lead at the five-sixteenths, dueled outside of the winner in the stretch and missed while able to get the place. NEEDED was well placed just off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, pursued the top two in the drive and finished willingly for the show. SUPERSTARSUSAN broke near the back of the field, settled towards the rear, went three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and improved position. PRETTY UP was taken in hand at the start, settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was roused in the two path into the stretch then moved to the three path, came between horses into the final furlong and also improved position. GIOIA MIA broke out at the start, settled off the pace, was roused four wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive and lacked the needed response. SUN AND WIND broke very alertly, pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the turn and tired. FOLLOW YOUR ARROW stalked the pace down the backstretch, was taken up early on the turn, went three wide on that bend, spun four wide into the stretch and came up empty. MOTHER MARY dropped back off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, came four wide into the stretch and failed to respond. MASTERY'S SECRET was very slow into stride and spotted the front several lengths, saved ground on the turn, turned into the stretch in the two path then moved further out and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Being Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate,hustled,pace ins foe,rail,headed5/16,dueled,gamely
